summary: This document is an email forwarding a news article from NBC News about a new accuser who claims Jeffrey Epstein raped her when she was 15 years old. The email was sent from an iPhone on July 10, 2019.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the forwarded news article, accused of raping a 15-year-old girl.

events.title: New Accuser Comes Forward
events.description: A new accuser claims Jeffrey Epstein raped her when she was 15 years old, as reported in an NBC News article.

keyFacts: A new accuser came forward against Jeffrey Epstein in July 2019.
The accuser claims Epstein raped her when she was 15 years old.
The information was reported in an NBC News article.
The document is an email forwarding this news article, dated July 10, 2019.
